dtliExcerpt: Despite a talented cast and Douglas Carter Beane's clever book, 'Lysistrata Jones' feels more like a college production than a Broadway musical.
bwwExcerpt: You can’t combine so many cliches together and come up with something fresh. On the winning side, director-choreographer Dan Knechtges surrounds “Lyssie J” in good-looking production and his high-impact dance numbers that make your heart rate climb just watching them. The plot is about not giving it up, but the cast always delivers 100%.
